question: Which of the following is true regarding business politics?

answers.text: They do not vary from culture to culture.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Business people must decide the degree to which they are comfortable applying local ethics.

answers.text: Business politics can vary greatly across cultures, and businesspeople should decide what is within their own ethical compass before deciding to conduct international business.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Business ethics are not the same across cultures.

answers.text: Business ethics are the same across every culture.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Business politics do vary across cultures.

answers.text: When conducting business in a foreign market, you should always do what is asked of you, even if itâ€™s unethical or illegal in your home country.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Business politics vary greatly across cultures. Businesspeople must decide how far they are willing to adapt to the local expectations.

detailedSolution: Business politics vary greatly across cultures. Businesspeople must decide how far they are willing to adapt to the local expectations.
